metadata.description: eBPF network performance testing parameter specification
metadata.source: Generated from spec config: Performance Test Specification

test_cases.name: system_network_perfomance_metrics_rx_tcp
test_cases.command: sudo python3 ebpf-tools/performance/system-network/system_network_perfomance_metrics.py --internal-interface port-storage --phy-interface ens11 --src-ip 10.132.114.12 --dst-ip 10.132.114.11 --direction rx --protocol tcp
